medium: Etching, aquatint, scraper, and plate tone
title: Leon (Lion)
marks: Signature, Title and Edition Signed, titled, and numbered below image, in penci
description: slightly abstracted image; lion tamer at right with chair, with lines and decorations on his face and rather undifferentiated, rippling body; male lion seated at left; lioness lying at bottom of image
